content.raw:
The headers are not installed according to the pattern used in other ignition packages. For example, ignition-math2 installs the following:

~~~
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/Plane.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/Quaternion.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/IndexException.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/Pose3.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/Vector2.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/Line3.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/SphericalCoordinates.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/Inertial.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/SignalStats.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/Angle.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/Box.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/Vector4.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/RotationSpline.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/Temperature.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/config.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/Line2.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/MassMatrix3.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/Spline.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/Helpers.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/Vector3Stats.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/Matrix3.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/AffineException.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/Rand.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/Kmeans.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/Matrix4.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/Vector3.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/Frustum.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/Filter.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/PID.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/Triangle.hh
~~~

This package installs the following by contrast:

~~~
/usr/include/common/URI.hh
/usr/include/common/Image.hh
/usr/include/common/MovingWindowFilter.hh
/usr/include/common/NodeAnimation.hh
/usr/include/common/ColladaLoader.hh
/usr/include/common/Battery.hh
/usr/include/common/Color.hh
/usr/include/common/SingletonT.hh
/usr/include/common/SemanticVersion.hh
/usr/include/common/SVGLoader.hh
/usr/include/common/MaterialDensity.hh
/usr/include/common/System.hh
/usr/include/common/NodeTransform.hh
/usr/include/common/Exception.hh
/usr/include/common/Console.hh
/usr/include/common/SkeletonNode.hh
/usr/include/common/KeyFrame.hh
/usr/include/common/ImageHeightmap.hh
/usr/include/common/Timer.hh
/usr/include/common/Dem.hh
/usr/include/common/Animation.hh
/usr/include/common/ColladaExporter.hh
/usr/include/common/MeshManager.hh
/usr/include/common/Uuid.hh
/usr/include/common/MouseEvent.hh
/usr/include/common/Mesh.hh
/usr/include/common/MeshCSG.hh
/usr/include/common/AudioDecoder.hh
/usr/include/common/MeshExporter.hh
/usr/include/common/Event.hh
/usr/include/common/SubMesh.hh
/usr/include/common/HeightmapData.hh
/usr/include/common/Skeleton.hh
/usr/include/common/Video.hh
/usr/include/common/Util.hh
/usr/include/common/SkeletonAnimation.hh
/usr/include/common/STLLoader.hh
/usr/include/common/BVHLoader.hh
/usr/include/common/GTSMeshUtils.hh
/usr/include/common/KeyEvent.hh
/usr/include/common/Base64.hh
/usr/include/common/Types.hh
/usr/include/common/ffmpeg_inc.hh
/usr/include/common/EnumIface.hh
/usr/include/common/Time.hh
/usr/include/common/Material.hh
/usr/include/ignition/common0/ignition/common/config.hh
/usr/include/common.hh
~~~
content.html:
The headers are not installed according to the pattern used in other ignition packages. For example, ignition-math2 installs the following:

/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/Plane.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/Quaternion.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/IndexException.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/Pose3.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/Vector2.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/Line3.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/SphericalCoordinates.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/Inertial.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/SignalStats.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/Angle.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/Box.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/Vector4.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/RotationSpline.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/Temperature.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/config.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/Line2.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/MassMatrix3.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/Spline.hh

/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/Filter.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/PID.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2/ignition/math/Triangle.hh

This package installs the following by contrast:

/usr/include/common/URI.hh
